description: Kusanagi is an http://anidb.net/t1097 [Amanto] from the planet Excalibur. He came to Earth looking for another battle and after a while, due to sword ban, he became dull and his owner put him and his wife, http://anidb.net/ch92172 [Saaya], up for sale. Someone bought them rather quickly, but he was thrown away shortly after due to his condition.
name: Kusanagi
